= Introduction =

We're looking for contributors to assist in development of the following components:

* Port more Blackberry APIs over to C#.
* Work on the C# to Java translator application
* Write Visual Studio.Net 2008 IDE add-on
* Write Visual Studio.Net 2010 IDE add-on

Please contact the owner (Lennie De Villiers) if you wish to contribute.
Require Visual Studio.Net 2008/2010 with C#.
